website_summaries.verdict: This bag is perfect for the yogi who's using a thinner, beginner mat and doesn't have a lot of gear to carry.
pros: Adjustable shoulder strap with full zipper closure
Two convenient pockets for easy storage
cons: Difficult to fit items in exterior pockets with mat in bag

customer_reviews.title: If you have a good quality yoga / exercise mat that is customarily thicker ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these mat bags. These work for the smallests, cheapest end type of yoga /exercise mat. Should you have a good quality yoga / exercise mat that is customarily 1/2" thicker, then these won't fit. They are absolutely cute. I will use them to bring beach towels to the beach and store the car keys. (Design is not just about drawing a cute little tree and choosing a color, design is mostly about functionality.
customer_reviews.author: G. Bianco

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit 23" wide mat.
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars because it seems like a well made bag. Only 2 stars because it is in no way big enough for either of my mats. The 25" measurment listed in the description is the bag flat out with the ends folded out. The actual storage area measures 23" on the outside of the bag. This bag does not fit all 3mm-6mm mats as the description claims. My 5mm 23" wide mat will not fit. My 3mm 25" wide mat might fit if I fold it in half lengthwise before I roll it. I'm very disappointed. Keep looking if you have a thicker mat, even if it is only 23" wide.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Ward

customer_reviews.title: I have a big yoga mat and the way the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a big yoga mat and the way the picture and description was laid out that I would have room in my yoga bag. It wasn't even the complete opposite the yoga bag couldn't fit around my yoga mat because the mat was to thick not long. Even if it was long it still wouldn't have fit. If you have a thin yoga mat it's worth it. If you yoga mat is long and/or thick it's not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R Douglin

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit, but well made
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this wouldn't fit the mat(s) we had, but it did snug right in there and zipped up *fairly* easily. I was concerned that the stress on the zipper, might cause tearing, long term, but the seams eased out and the fabric relaxed and it's actually a great fit for our mat. These are fairly sturdy mats, a little bit higher thickness, but not too crazy. I wouldn't recommend this bag for extra long or extra thick mats, but for a medium weight, it's a great fit and beautifully made!
customer_reviews.author: kulevyajenn

customer_reviews.title: Yoga love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this Yoga bag! Granted, it is the first bag that I've ever purchased; I typically crochet my own, but when I saw this one I had to have it. My currently yoga mat is a Gaiam 3mm, and the bag fits with plenty of leftover room. However, I just ordered a 6mm yoga mat and I think it'll fit, but I can't say just yet. When it gets in (might be a while), I'll update my post if it doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Luman

customer_reviews.title: Delighted
customer_reviews.text: I'm delighted with this yoga mat bag! The pockets make such a big difference, so that I don't have to carry an additional bag for small items I need. They're big enough not only for a phone, cards, or money, but also for medication that I need to have with me. The adjustable strap is long enough to sling across my chest; hopefully it will work with a winter coat as well. The zipper is convenient for taking the mat in and out. If the zipper holds up, this will be a terrific bag on all counts. Plus I love the design, and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Love my bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag just arrived. The bag is a bright blue and very beautiful. It has two pockets - one on the front and one on the back. The tree print is lovely and my mat fits perfectly into the bag. I had to extend the shoulder strap all the way open to carry it on my shoulder. I could not place it across my body if I tried. However, I would not carry my mat/bag like that. For the most part, I am excited to start using my new bag and it will make practicing yoga a little easier. :)
customer_reviews.author: SoCal <3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bag
customer_reviews.text: I have a high quality mat and this bag holds it well, still giving me access to the outer pocket (at most a small towel, strap, keys & phone, or my sport Tervis without closing the top). I use this along with a yoga backpack and everything, 2 blocks, large towel, strap, blanket & bolster can travel with me when needed. Otherwise, this bag alone does the job to & from class several times a week. Washes & cleans up well too!
customer_reviews.author: CinnE

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!! SUPER GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I got the black with the white tree. It fits my yoga mat perfectly. And the pockets are super nice for my other yoga things. The material is super sturdy, reminds me of the strength of jeans or burlap but it’s really nice and smooth. The strap is perfect and not flimsy at all. 10/10 best mat bag I have the 3mm mat in regular blue, For comparison to your mat or if you want to buy one you know will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Twig

customer_reviews.title: Large enough to fit a 72" x 24 x 6MM Yoga Mat easily.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this yoga mat bag as a gift to be paired with a yoga mat that I bought separately. This bag was perfect! Easily fitting a large / thick 72" x 24 x 6MM Yoga Mat. The material and strap both seem high quality and durable. My friend loved the color of green and the fact it had two pockets on the outside -- large enough for her phone and wallet, with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Kiera Schwanny

customer_reviews.title: Best yoga bag.....
customer_reviews.text: This yoga bag is very nice. It has been used at a yoga retreat so far, and is easy to put the mat in without a hassle, the zipper is strong and goes from the top of the cover to the bottom allowing easy access. The bag is also roomy for those times you're in a rush and haven't rolled up the mat perfectly. The pockets add an extra bit of convenience with plenty of space for straps, keys, wallet, or an energy bar. The material is strong enough to withstand all the tossing around a yoga mat bag has to endure. All in all, a good price for a very good yoga bag.
customer_reviews.author: P Sivad

customer_reviews.title: Pockets are weird; but overall happy
customer_reviews.text: This yoga bag is nice with one major exception; the pockets are hard to access with the mat inside. I keep my keys and phone in the pockets and I really struggle getting my keys out at the end of class because the pockets feel very tight. They're also in a weird position when you have the bag strapped around your arm. My thin mat fits well in here though and it seems to be pretty sturdy so I am happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice yoga mat bag. The material is sturdy. The design is really beautiful. The two pockets on the side are great for holding phone, keys, and mat cleaner. I have the Yes4All Premium Mystic Lily Purple 5mm mat (B0122S9JLI) and it fits great. It is exactly what I was looking for and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DoeEyedFawn

customer_reviews.title: Really nice carrying bag!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I really dig this bag. It's almost exactly what I was looking for. It's got 2 pockets that are just that right size to carry your essentials like your phone and your wallet. And it looks pretty slick ( I purchased the black bag). If I could change 1 thing, I would make the carrying strap longer. It's great if I want to toss the bag over my shoulder, but it's a bit tight when I wear it across my body during bike rides (male: 5'9", 200lbs, fairly broad chest). But as a whole, it's as advertised, sturdy and pretty sharp. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Curry

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the blue bag with the turtle...love the vibrant color! It's large enough to stow my 6mm mat, water bottle and towel. Not sure why the instructions said to wash it first, but I washed as instructed and it did not shrink or fade. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: My 2 Cents

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have a nice mat that came with a cheap yoga mat bag that promptly ripped. I wanted a nice, sturdy one that ideally would facilitate holding keys, etc while I'm in class. This one seems perfect. I just started using it but it seems well made, I like the way it looks and the two cargo pockets are pretty roomy and close tightly. My mat is a little oversized and fits fine in the bag. I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Cook

customer_reviews.title: Strong and roomy
customer_reviews.text: Love this. There are 2 large pockets with velcro closures. The zipper opens across the top and down the side. The strap adjusts. The fabric feels like brushed denim. It's a good, heavy weight material. My 24" wide mat fits with about 6 inches of room left on top and plenty of room around the diameter. The only complaint is that the black color shows every piece of lint.
customer_reviews.author: WorldGypsyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Yoga Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these yoga bags, one for myself and one for my husband. It fits our yoga mats perfectly. The material is thick and durable. Zips down the side for easy access and has a storage pocket on the front. The colors are vibrant and it has the Tree Of Life on the bag. We really do like these bags. We've had them for months now and they are still holding up as the day we received them. I'm really glad that I chose this bag compared to the others online.
customer_reviews.author: phillygrl

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect me. My yoga mat rolls up and fits ...
customer_reviews.text: I have practiced yoga for 15 years, never used a tote or bag. I decided to try this Fit Spirit bag, based on the reviews. It is perfect me. My yoga mat rolls up and fits right into the bag, the double zipper makes it easy to stuff and throw into the back of my car. I don't know how I got along without this bag. This product is a good one at a good price, and it's purple!!
customer_reviews.author: Yogigram

customer_reviews.title: Too short for any mat
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very cute and seems that it would be very durable, also. However, it is way TOO SHORT to fit a yoga mat, as yoga mats are traditionally rolled. I guess if you folded your mat, it might fit, but then your mat would be weirdly creased and not comfortably usable.
customer_reviews.author: Dananda

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous bag, beautifully made, fits 5 mm thick yoga mat perfectly
customer_reviews.text: What a gorgeous bag...and at an awesome price! Fits my Gaiam 5mm- thick yoga mat perfectly, with a little wiggle room to spare. Buy it as a gift for all the yogis in your life...they will adore it.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Nice yoga mat carrier!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent carrier. I haven't used it often (yet) but I like the color a lot and it's roomy enough to fit my thicker yoga mat. I had to jostle it a bit when I was first using it, but the cotton has some nice give. I will be washing it on cold and air drying it. Definitely worth the price. I did not expect to fit a bunch of other stuff in the bag and this is not that type of bag. If you have much to carry to yoga class with you, this bag is not for you. I take my keys, ID, and mat. This carrier does that well for me.
customer_reviews.author: RN_Mom

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves this bag!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our granddaughter for her yoga mat. This bag has enough pockets for everything she needs to tote her mat & personal necessities. It feels very durable & it is spacious for her mat. Cute turtle design too. Zipper glides nicely. Highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Wombee

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I use it once a week for my yoga class and I am so happy I purchased this full bag size. I see others at yoga class fudging with a strap or small tie and their mats usually fall out before they make it to the car. I can wrap my mat in one minute and have it in the bag in another minute. The zipper is durable and I use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie J

customer_reviews.title: Very nice yoga mat bag
customer_reviews.text: After seeing some reviews that said the bags were too small, I was a little hesitant, but the one I ordered (black with mantra hand and om symbol) is much larger than necessary for my sticky mat. I can easily fit a towel in as well. The instructions said to wash the bag before using (to get rid of the manufacturing chemicals I guess) inside out on delicate setting and air dry, which I did. It came out fine and seems to be very sturdy and durable. The pockets with Velcro are convenient to hold keys and such. Very satisfied with the purchase—also the price and free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Marie S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag Just Needs More Room
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag because of the material and the design. I simply wish that it were a bit longer. My mat fits in snuggly, but it barely leaves any room for my small yoga towel and definitely doesn't leave much room in the outer pockets. If you don't carry much else in your yoga bag, then this bag is a nice choice.
customer_reviews.author: Reana Gates

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The size fits a standard size yoga matt it would not fit a thick mat. I also fit my water bottle in the outside pocket and my yoga socks in the other pocket and my yoga towel fits inside with the matt . Very happy with bag.
customer_reviews.author: BabsRV

customer_reviews.title: Good quality canvas
customer_reviews.text: I've been carrying my yoga mat in this bag for quite some time now and I really like it. It comes with two very useful pockets on the outside. Because I'm tall my yoga mat is longer than the regular ones so I wish the bag wouldn't fit so tight around my mat.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: This yoga mat bag is handy for storing a yoga strap in the side pocket (if you use one) or small towel. I have also received many compliments on this cargo bag. It makes me smile knowing a bought a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Melodie Rochette

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: GET THIS CASE WHILE IT'S STILL ON SALE!! I think the list price is $40; I would have paid maybe $25 but $13 is a steal! The price for this case is about the same price as some of the carrying straps you can get. But this bag keeps it covered and protected plus it has 2 pockets that I keep my yoga strap & sweat towel in. Also my long yoga towel fits inside with the mat.
customer_reviews.author: RT ॐ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy material and should last a long time. Since I use my mat about 5 times a week, it is important to have a bag that is easy to clean, has pockets, and can easily get my mat in and out. This one does it!
customer_reviews.author: Karin Kelly-Givens

customer_reviews.title: Bag fits yoga mat size 68" x24" x 4mm
customer_reviews.text: The yoga bag works perfectly for my new Gaiam yoga mat: 68"x24"x4mm thick. The bag is well made. The bag won't fit yoga mats larger than this. I like that it has a strap as it makes it easier to carry it with my hands being free. It's very affordable. I like the side pocket for my car keys and I can have them with me during the class. I wish the pocket had a zipper though. Overall I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bozena Derek-Glover

customer_reviews.title: 2" too short for my 6mm mat
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag, but it's 2" to short for my 6mm yoga mat. the cost to return this is 1/2 what I paid. I'm disapointed because I can't use it. I think the description should be updated - unless... is there anyone else out there with a 6mm mat that has been able to use this? This is the one I have:
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer222222222

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and tough; it protects my yoga mat from pet hair and the elements and looks beautiful. Also, the zipper wasn’t too loud for me to open in class (my teacher was a stickler for zen and nonstealing).
customer_reviews.author: McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Well made bag, love the pockets!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a purple tree of life one for about six months now and it has worked very well. I can easily get my 6 mm mat inside of it. The 2-way zippers is great, as is the large cargo pocket. It's made of durable fabric, cotton I think. I just ordered this second one as a gift (got blue since purple wasn't an option - sad!). I don't know why people wouldn't spend a few more dollars to buy this nice bag vs just a strap!
customer_reviews.author: MV in PA

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: The package came fast and in a good condition. The yoga mat (I got the black one) Is nice, sturdy, easy to carry, and I really like the pockets. The only little bug is that the bag is just a little smaller than I thought it would be. Mat alone fits well and has some room left over, but when i roll it together with my yoga towel (and it is a very thin lightweight towel), or roll the mat separately and fold the towel, I have to do it extra tight so that it would fit. Otherwise, nice carrier!
customer_reviews.author: Tomochka

customer_reviews.title: Ok but don't plan to put anything big in the pockets
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag and it's zipper 2 way pulls. I do not like that the pockets are not pleated. Tried to put the belt in one and then couldn't zip up the bag. I could squeeze it in after the mat was in the bag but not very efficient when trying to get out of yoga class with next class coming in. Colors are very bright and pleasing to the eye. Made well. Lovely design on outside....just the pockets need to be expandable !
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My yoga mat is only 1cm high so I have a lot of extra space in this bag when I roll it up- which is great because I can fit my gym towel, a bottle and jumping rope etc. and still have room. There are a couple of outside pockets that aren't all that big but they fit keys, credit cards and phones. I bought the purple one and the color is pretty much exactly as the picture. Overall very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Anne

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy canvas with convenient pockets for a strap
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy canvas with convenient pockets for a strap, your grippy gloves, and any other smallish accessories you may need to bring with. I got a 1/4" thick extra long mat (72") and it fits with wiggle room. If your wanted to put a 3/8" mat in it you could.
customer_reviews.author: J.Burlingame

customer_reviews.title: The size is not right
customer_reviews.text: I have a regular yoga mat and the bag is not lengthy enough to put my mat inside. I have to leave the bag open on the top with my mat showing. Complete fail.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6year old for an after school yoga class and it was perfect! Needed something durable, that could hold the yoga mat but also a change of clothes and snack without being bulky or awkward to carry. Probably won’t fit adult size change of clothes but Pockets can definitely include wallet, keys, etc. and great material quality
customer_reviews.author: danaa

customer_reviews.title: Yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only recently received this Yoga Bag, and it’s exactly what I wanted. It appears sturdy, and has 2 outside pockets. I’m planning a trip very soon, and want to carry my mat rather than taking up space in my suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Muller

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and seemingly sturdy yoga mat bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my daughter. She absolutely loves it. Her yoga mat fit perfectly inside. I ordered the pink bag with the tree if life design and it’s beautiful. There are two decent sized pockets that close with Velcro. The bag also has an adjustable strap. It seems very well made.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for mat
customer_reviews.text: Love this little case - perfect for carrying the mat and nice pocket for water or whatever! Sturdy full length zipper so no hassles getting the bag in one end. Great value for price.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This bag fits my yoga mat perfectly. I like that the zipper spans the length of the bag, making it quick and easy to put the mat in there after class ends. The cargo pockets are great for my keys, gym card, etc. The fabric and stitching seem pretty durable too. I purchased the purple one and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Albino Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, multiple pockets, and pretty color!
customer_reviews.text: Brought my light yoga mat on the plane and cruise and used this holder for transport and to keep it clean. It’s functional with multiple sections, pockets, zippers. Will hold very large mats if needed. The strap is thick and doesn’t dig in to your shoulder. Very pretty color!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Desiree Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty Gym Bag Substitute..
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this bag in a very pretty purple...looks just like the picture. Unfortunately, the yoga mat that I ordered was way to thick and won't fit in the bag. The bag is so pretty I use it as a gym bag and the pockets come in handy because I don't have to carry a purse. Material is sturdy and I can see using this bag for the next couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Eyes

customer_reviews.title: The bag is beautiful and durable
customer_reviews.text: The bag is beautiful and durable, color is true to photo. I am just bummed that the side pockets wont hold anything, really, once my mat is inside and its zipped up. Money, phone, sure, but your towels, yoga blocks or bands will not fit in this so of you seek a "carry-all", this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, headed to class now
customer_reviews.text: I'm headed to class today using my bag for the first time. And my new gaim mat too, actually! My dog ate my other mat, so I think a bag was in order. Sometimes products ordered online are complete and total crap.... I'm REALLY happy with this buy. (I also bought new yoga pants, a yoga top, and a sweater---from different companies---... Those are all being returned because the sizing was waaaaay off). I'd definitely recommend this bag. Cute. Functional. Great pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for my 1st yoga bag
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad for my 1st yoga bag. I wish the strap was longer so I could have a little bit of leeway when wearing it across my body with a thick jacket on. The bag itself is not soft and it's kind of rigid. If you are looking to stuff anything else other than a yoga mat in the main compartment (like a yoga towel) there isn't much room. The pockets can't really fit much either. My dreams of putting all my stuff in one bag and hitting yoga class were eliminated when I couldn't fit anything but a few hair ties in the pockets. Next time I will definitely just buy a strap, bag is sorta unnecessary.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Swalnick

customer_reviews.title: Great bag with plenty of room...
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag... they 1st sent the wrong color but received the black one today... (also ordered a purple - it's beautiful too) Well made.. nice size .. i have a thinner mat and it fits great with plenty of room if i had a 2nd rolled up with it or a much thicker mat. Lots of extra storage on the outside if you need it - keys, shirt, bands, etc... my nylon bags just couldn't handle the use !!
customer_reviews.author: Seagull9

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very nice, but it is too small for my mat. I’m giving it 4 stars because it is not their fault. I have a cork/rubber mat that can’t be rolled as tightly as standard mats. It is a very nice bag, however, and I would recommend it for most mats.
customer_reviews.author: Bob The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bag
customer_reviews.text: With purchase of first yoga mat needed a bag, did much research and this bag is attractive, perfect fit, reasonably priced and arrived the very next day! Great company to trust. Namaste.
customer_reviews.author: Donald McClelland

customer_reviews.title: A little too small for my mat...
customer_reviews.text: I got the green yoga bag for Christmas. It's beautiful, but it barely fits my yoga mat and the accessories I carry with me (keys, China Gel, yoga membership card, lock, etc. There's no "extra" room in the bag, which was disappointing. While the outside pocket looks big, it's not. It barely fits the China Gel and I tried squeezing two bottles in there...nope! :( The bag is nicely made, but I won't purchase again for the fact that it's too tight for the accessories I carry.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I love this color pink is always number one with me ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this color pink is always number one with me but hard to find in stores for daily use items. Thank you amazon for meeting me on this matter. It covers my Matt and I’m going to put a hook up to hand it up on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large w/ 2 big pockets and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: As expected really large with enough pockets yo put my cell phone my car keys and a small water bottle ( 2 large pockets) , my yoga matt fits comfortably in it, the color is one hue less than the pic but it still in the pin color range and is pretty, thank you
customer_reviews.author: nour

customer_reviews.title: Check your mat size FIRST before buying.
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure the bag is fine, but it DOES NOT FIT LARGER OR THICKER MATS. Be absolutely sure of your mat dimensions before buying a yoga bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jason McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and excellent quality! The color is Rich and the pattern is crisp with clean lines. Lovely to look at and fits my yoga mat with a bit of room to spare which for me is a good thing!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the good quality because it is so inexpensive! The fabric and workmanship are excellent. My mat fits in perfectly and there are 2 pockets for keys, phone, etc. It makes riding my bike to yoga easy.
customer_reviews.author: BookCrone

customer_reviews.title: so how perfect could this get
customer_reviews.text: I've centered my religious practice around the Tree of Life, so how perfect could this get? Easy to open up, very well stitched, hefty gym bag style handles. It appears to be washable in the machine, but I'd probably still recommend the delicate cycle. With a minimum of basic care, this bag will last a good many years.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Grooms

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is very comfortable and easily washable. The bag has good room to add a towel, clothing, car keys, anything if needed. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S. Hinojosa-lin

customer_reviews.title: Be aware that it's probably better NOT to order this type of bag that closes ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a small, short bag that did not fit my mat at all. It was just a hassle to return it, or I would have done so. Be aware that it's probably better NOT to order this type of bag that closes all the way, as it may very well not fit your particular mat.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D. Charles

customer_reviews.title: May work for a very thin mat
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1cm mat and no matter how tightly I roll my mat, it will not fit into this bag. It may work for a 4 to 6mm mat.
customer_reviews.author: jaccoats

customer_reviews.title: I like the pockets
customer_reviews.text: Cute color, cute bag. I like the pockets. I am able to fit the yoga mat in there. It is small then my very old Yoga mat bag holder but this one is great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: I think it would hold most mats.
customer_reviews.text: Got my g.f. a new mat for Christmas and we wanted to keep it clean between classes.She stores it in the back of her suv.This will work great and has some extra pockets for a bottle of water.
customer_reviews.author: eric wingard

customer_reviews.title: Very Spiritual Symbol!
customer_reviews.text: I got my new yoga mat bag delivered and it was just how I pictured it in my head! The hand reminds me to always stay on point! Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deeqa A. Omar

customer_reviews.title: Bag to small for a mat
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bag and a yoga mat for my wife. The mat goes inside the bag but it will not zip total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rick H

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it perfect size for regular yoga mats fits my giam mat and my Jade mat with extra room to put a towel or clothes in. It’s too small for a manduka pro which needs it’s own special cover. None of the regular yoga mat covers fit manduka pros so if you have just about any other mat it should fit well
customer_reviews.author: Tristen Heitz

customer_reviews.title: Exercise in Style
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered this thinking it had the mat with it. But it’s a great bag. It fits my mat perfectly. Easy to carry. Nice quality, nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Wonda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 4mm yoga mat perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this yoga mat bag for my 4mm Manduka eKO lite yoga mat. I like that my mat fits perfectly! Also it has two nice size pockets to hold things like keys and/or wallet/ID. The canvas material isn’t heavy and it’s sturdy while the strap is a couple of inches wide so it won’t dig into your shoulder. I highly recommend this yoga mat bag if your yoga mat is 4mm or less. I’m not sure if it would fit a thicker mat.
customer_reviews.author: Hiroko Todoroki

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Pretty design & color, light-weight. Fits everything I need for my travel to yoga. Huge, huge hit at my yoga site. Great gift for your yoga instructor plus very affordable❣️
customer_reviews.author: Maria Druck

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It is exactly as pictured and fits my yoga mat very well with room to spare and I have a longer than usual yoga mat.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Not only for Yoga
customer_reviews.text: The bag fits my mat perfectly and helps me tote my mat to Tai Chi class twice a week. The pockets are awesome! I can carry my wallet with my driver's license and other things in one of the pockets; my keys in another pocket. I highly recommend this bag. Material is strong and the pattern is really cool. I love my bag!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Joga mat
customer_reviews.text: Is strong, well done and perfect size for my yoga mat from everlast. Also fit in the other pockets my towel, deodorant, socks, hair brush, inside I put my changing clothes, so plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely put together, colorful and useful
customer_reviews.text: The yoga bag fits well, has zippers two ways, with a very attractive color with a nice tree logo
customer_reviews.author: rharrah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Seems great so far! My standard size jade harmony yoga may fits in this perfectly. The pockets are an added plus. The blue color is super pretty too. Would recommend to any yogi!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Poor strap design
customer_reviews.text: The tree design is cute, but I don't like the fact that the carry strap doesn’t go from end to end on the bag. As a result, it doesn’t hang straight up and down when the strap is over my shoulder, so it whacks into things a lot. Roomy bag for the price, though.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Not a huge deal because the bag fits pretty snug to my mat and anything inside the pocket ...
customer_reviews.text: Velcro for the pocket flap was placed inside the pocket, rendering it ineffective. Not a huge deal because the bag fits pretty snug to my mat and anything inside the pocket while my mat is in there stays pretty well without the top flap to hold it in. All in all without the defect that I assume came from just sewing the pocket on inside out, the bag is exactly what I expected, seems durable and looks very nice
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for me.
customer_reviews.text: This bag wasn't big enough to fit my mat which is apparently thicker than average. The "cargo" pockets are actually patch pockets which are not useful except for carrying anything which is small and flat. I was hoping to fit a towel in one but no luck. I do love the printed design and gave mine to a friend whose mat would fit.
customer_reviews.author: MontanaSail

customer_reviews.title: Nice but lint sticks to it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and easy to use. The only downside is that it attracts lint like crazy, and it’s not easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended to all!! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this yoga mat bag! Perfect shade of pink. Easy in and out. Zipper up and down. Two pockets. Sling for your shoulder. Perfect for grab and go. This was a excellent choice and would recommend this bag to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Britta H

customer_reviews.title: Storage pockers alot of room
customer_reviews.text: Great usage for my Yoga mat. I use the storage pockets to hold my yoga clean spray, yoga belt and hand towel I use to lay my head on when in yoga class. Alot of space even when yoga mat is in bag.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Broadnax

customer_reviews.title: Fit even my oversized mat
customer_reviews.text: Carrying case for my yoga bag, my oversized mat fit. Very happy, my strap broke and I needed a neat way to store my bag
customer_reviews.author: SexySadie

customer_reviews.title: The mat fits fine and it zips easily
customer_reviews.text: The mat fits fine and it zips easily. I had thought the tree was white and had hoped the black and white would coordinate with a carrier I also bought for my block and blankets. But the tree is grey. Ok, but not white as I'd thought from the photo on line.
customer_reviews.author: Aida

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my weekly yoga classes!
customer_reviews.text: My standard yoga mat fits perfectly! Also looks like I could fit a small towel in with it too. The pockets are the perfect size for my keys, phone, and cards/cash. The zipper works well, and the adjustable strap is nice to have! The purple is lovely and rich, and the Tree of Life is a bit more pink than in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, but does not fit Manduka Mats
customer_reviews.text: it is soooo cute and beautiful quality...but to my dismay it did not fit my Manduka mat! It does say fits all 6 mm mats, but it was my bad for not first measuring the width . Too Cute to return so I'm keeping it for my very older and smaller mat
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice size
customer_reviews.text: My yoga mat fits perfectly in this bag. It has two pockets. Larger one at bottom of bag and smaller one at top of bag. Comes with strap so it frees up my hands. Good quality and nice size. I would buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie E

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a yoga bag for some time now and finally decided to get one and was excited about getting this one since I've started yoga again. Love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Taunya

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga Mat Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This tote bag has a ton of pockets and it fits my yoga mat perfectly. My phone, keys, and anything else I need is right with me during class. I use this every other day and absolutely love it! It's been a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria S.

customer_reviews.title: Yoga mat Bag
customer_reviews.text: The Yoga Mat Bag is a good accessory to keep items organized before and after yoga class. It has been durable so far. The pocket is large for carrying items that may be needed in class. Best of all the Yoga Mat Bag is very nice looking and perfect for carrying the yoga mat.
customer_reviews.author: awslp

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. My mat fits, and the two pockets make it perfect for quick trips to the park for yoga withouosing my keys or cell phone. The adjustable shoulder strap is very comfortable. And the design is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case and well made. Pockets perfect for wipes and deodorant for when I don't have time for shower right after class.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for the price. I think it's big enough for 2 mats, the colors are great and I love the pockets. Good size for kids too.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, hold my yoga mat perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, hold my yoga mat perfectly. I fold my mat over and then roll it (as to not to get the bottom of the mat touching the top) and it fits fine. Color is just what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and the style of the bag
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the style of the bag, but turns out it doesn't have much space. So if you are looking for a bag to carry both mat and towel, this might not work. It has two pockets which are not very useful once you have your mat inside. Aside from that, color is just like in the picture, fabric is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Susana Jaimes

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: My wife stole this almost as soon as I got it. It fits my 72” mat perfectly, but not hers. If you have a truly thick mat then it might not fit in this bag. Shoulder strap could stand to be about 5-6” longer, but still works just fine. It has two pockets and I’m really happy about that. Very good bag for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Edwards

customer_reviews.title: The style is cool, and the cost is like
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, ordered twice and both broke within the first use. The style is cool, and the cost is like, but didn't get the job done for me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mis

customer_reviews.title: Like this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. It is just like the one she bought me for my birthday. I liked it so much that when she wanted one I bought the same.
customer_reviews.author: Veletta G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for carting large needlework projects around
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bag to accommodate my large needlework scrolls and this worked great. It's also phenomenal value - I love the colour, and it feels well made and not at all cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Aglaia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bag for a yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bag for a yoga mat. Easily holds a 3mm yoga mat WITH a microfiber yoga mat towel wrapped around it, or a 5-6mm yoga mat by itself. The two pockets are great for a small spray bottle, wallet, keys, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fata

product_meta.title: FIT SPIRIT Exercise Yoga Mat Gym Bag with 2 Cargo Pockets
product_meta.description:
Product Details 

Maximize your Yoga Experience with our new Fit Spirit Yoga Mat Bags. Our bags were designed to hold all key components of your Yoga Class and everyday essentials. With its zipper cargo pocket, you can be sure to carry your day to day essentials hassle free and worry free. Fit Spirits Full Zipper design ensures you will be able to access your yoga mat with ease at a moments notice. With its durable 100% canvas material, why shop anywhere else for your Yoga Mat Bag, youÕve already found the best.
feature_bullets: Package Includes: 1 - Black Yoga Bag (YOGA MAT NOT INCLUDED)
Dimensions: 25.5" Long x 6" Diameter / 9" x 5.25" Pocket-1 / 5.5" x 4.25" Pocket-2
Material: Durable 100% Canvas for easy maintenance
Fits Spirit Yoga Bags will fit all 3mm and 6mm Yoga Mats / Cargo Pockets are perfect for keys, cell phone and other essentials.
Full Zipper Design for easy access / Adjustable shoulder strap makes carrying your yoga mat easy and efficient.
